attributes.action: NHS to be able to pay for Dylexic assessments
attributes.additional_details: For a child and an adult to find out how Dylexic efffect them can cost a lot. a Specialist Dyslexia Teacher/Assessor British cost around £300-400 (http://www.bdadyslexia.org.uk/parent/frequently-asked-questions#Q3)  Psychological Society can cost £450 (http://www.bdadyslexia.org.uk/parent/frequently-asked-questions#Q3)  this out cost range for a lot people and I think that is NHS should be able to help pay for
